component.name: Heroic LSFG Applier
component.summary: Enable Lossless Scaling frame generation for Heroic games on Steam Deck

description.p: Heroic LSFG Applier makes it easy to enable the LSFG-VK Decky plugin (Lossless Scaling frame generation via Vulkan layer) for games installed through Heroic Games Launcher on your Steam Deck.

ul.li: View all games installed via Heroic Games Launcher
Apply or remove LSFG frame generation to selected games
Create backups before making any changes
Search and filter your game library

description.p: This app modifies game configuration files to add the required environment variable for LSFG-VK. Always create a backup before applying changes!
